metadata.title: CVE-2024-46713 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:perf/aux: Fix AUX buffer serializationOle reported that event->mmap_mutex is strictly insufficient toserialize the AUX buffer, add a per RB mutex to fully serialize it.Note that in the lock order comment the perf_event::mmap_mutex orderwas already wrong, that is, it nesting under mmap_lock is not new withthis patch.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
